creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
description: Expressionist sketch of quickly drawn, overlapping lines in red, blue, orange, yellow, green, purple and pink; the lower half of the composition consists of a smaller rectangular drawing characterized by the same lines and a predominantly light blue center
image_copyright: © Sam Gilliam%2C Courtesy Steven Andersen%2C Vermillion Editions%2C Ltd.
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
title: Study for "Coffee Thyme"
